price: Ya ku waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Idan kun yi ɗã'aga wani ɓangare daga waɗanda aka bai wa Littãfi, zã su mayar da ku kãfirai a bãyan ĩmãninku!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تُطِيعُواْ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَرُدُّوكُم بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِكُمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tuṭīʿū farīqan mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba yaruddūkum baʿda īmānikum kāfirīna
